snippet: The 25 million euro restoration of a classic Art Deco movie theater has shined a new light on the rough but storied neighborhood of Barbès.
abstract: The 25 million euro restoration of a classic Art Deco movie theater has shined a new light on the rough but storied neighborhood of Barbès.

headline.main: In Paris, a Ragtag, Resplendent District Prepares for Its Close-Up
